mapper.select: /*자기소개 보유기술 조회 */ SELECT ps.user_skill_code, ps.user_id, ps.user_skill, ps.user_skill_rank, ps.user_experience, ps.user_reg_date, ps.profile_hidden, ps.profile_application_hidden FROM profile_skill as ps WHERE user_id = #{sessionId};

/*보유기술 상세조회 */ select ps.user_skill_code, ps.user_id, ps.user_skill, ps.user_skill_rank, ps.user_experience, ps.user_reg_date, ps.profile_hidden, ps.profile_application_hidden from profile_skill as ps where ps.user_skill_code = #{userSkillCode};
